title: Automation and Control Technical Manager
details: Technical Manager of EMPRO, a SCADA designed to monitor and control renewable energy generation and industrial facilities.
◌ Coordinate and lead development team from a technical point of view.
◌ Design, develop, implement and deploy new parts of the system.

title: Computer Engineer (internship)
details: Analysis of data collected by the SCADA system for photovoltaic plants using techniques close to Big Data. I created an autonomous system to generate temporary reports that help to understand the sharing of the plant and the failures that can occur in it.

title: Software Developer (internship)
details: Practices developing web utilities for internal use, with the aim of improving the productivity of the company. Most of the projects were developed in HTML, CSS and JS, supported by Backbone.JS and Materialize libraries.

title: SCADA Engineer
details: Design and implement a data acquisition system for real time SCADA system. The project involves collecting data from different systems on a solar power plant and then put it in a database. Data acquisition part was developed in C ++ using libmodbus. In addition, we implemented a NodeJS server to facilitate data insertion.
